3.rawvalue:
## What Is It ##

This site is an implementation of product management and product development dashboard based on [Dave McClure][1] 's [Start Up Metrics For Pirates][2]

![Product Management And Product Development][3]

## What Does It Do? ##

It enables all employees, advisors and investors in web-based start-ups to have a single view of operational metrics and process.

The model can be built, and then individuals can be given permission to update particular fields with their data - the work is distributed but the model remains protected.

## How Would I Use It? ##

Your team would take the base product and tweak it for your start up.

## What Does It Replace? ##

It replaces e-mailing around version of spreadsheets and trying to make sense of how they correlate.

## Who Is It For? ##

Start-ups with 15+ employees, external investors as part of a functioning board and a working advisory board.

## Who Is It Not For? ##

Start-ups of 3 people in a garage - used Open Office/Excel, stand around the laptop and aspire to this :)

## What Does It Work On? ##
Firefox 3+ for Windows/Linux/Mac
Safari 3+ for Windows/Mac
Chrome for Windows/Linux

Users ***should*** be able to read but not create content with Internet Explorer 8 (on the feature list)

iPhone/iPad touch users can read but not create (might be on the feature list if there is demand)

We would like it to work on Blackberries and other business orientated devices.

If you have an iPad, send us a screenshot and win a mystery prize.


  [1]: http://500hats.typepad.com/
  [2]: http://www.slideshare.net/dmc500hats/startup-metrics-for-pirates-long-version
  [3]: http://imgur.com/cMTY0.png
